build.buildCommand: composer install --no-dev && npm ci && npm run build

deploy.startCommand: cp .env.railway .env && mkdir -p /tmp && touch /tmp/database.sqlite && chmod 777 /tmp/database.sqlite && php artisan config:clear && php artisan cache:clear && php artisan route:clear && php artisan view:clear && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache && php artisan storage:link && php artisan migrate:fresh --force --seed && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT
